titles.title: Guantanamo Recidivism Reduction Act of 2017
Guantanamo Recidivism Reduction Act of 2017

To direct the Secretary of Defense to make available to Congress certain information relating to individuals formerly detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, and for other purposes.
Guantanamo Recidivism Reduction Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
